item.title: CVE-2017-1001001|2024-08-05T22:00:41.650Z -- pluxml -- pluxml
item.description: PluXml version 5.6 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting vulnerability, within the article creation page, which can result in escalation of privileges.
